Career Objective
To associate with an organization where there is an ample scope for organizational as well as
individual growth. Seeking a position to utilize my skills and abilities in the Civil Engineering that
will enhance my professional skills in a dynamic and stable workplace.
Professional Experience
                                                                                                                                                                   
A  result  oriented  professional  with experience  of  Three  Years in  Construction  of  High  Rise
Residential  Buildings.  Experience  in  Quantity  Surveyor,  Monitoring  and  Planning  of  Budget
Construction Projects involving Method Engineering, Execution, Development and Resource Planning
in compliance to Quality standards.

Project Details                   :  Framed Structure with G+17 (2134 flats)
      Work Handled                       :  Execution of   MAINI (Aluminium) Shuttering 
                                                    BBS Preparation and Steel Reinforcement works
                                                    Quantity Estimation and Quality control as per BOQ
                                                    Monitoring of Concrete works 
                                                    Finishing works (Block works and Plastering works) 
                                                    

Roles and responsibilities held
1. Study of drawings in detail and taking out the bill of quantities.
2. Preparation of bar bending schedule for all structures.
3. Reviewing the Daily progress work report received from site and preparation of all kinds of
statements and tracking the progress of work as planned.
4. Preparation of monthly reconciliation reports.
5. Sub contract bill preparation, checking and approval.
6. Preparation of Balance work program followed by the rate analysis for the project.
7. Preparation of  Budget as per workable rate and rates existing in site, Preparation of Profit &
Loss statement.
8. Preparing the weekly, Monthly review meeting presentation as per Site details.
